instruction_text:
To troubleshoot Jira access issues:

1. Verify user account status:
   - Check if account is active in Jira Admin > User management
   - Verify email address is confirmed
   - Check if account is locked or suspended

2. Check user permissions:
   - Verify user is in 'jira-users' group (required for login)
   - Check global permissions in Administration
   - Verify project-level permissions

3. Password reset (if user forgot password):
   - User clicks 'Can't access your account?' on login page
   - Or admin can reset: User management > Select user > Reset password

4. Check browser/session issues:
   - Clear browser cache and cookies
   - Try incognito/private browsing mode
   - Try different browser
   - Clear Jira session cookies

5. Verify network/firewall:
   - Check if Jira URL is accessible
   - Verify no firewall blocking Jira domain
   - Check VPN connection if required

6. Check SSO/authentication:
   - Verify SSO configuration if using single sign-on
   - Check if user account is linked to SSO
   - Verify authentication method in user settings

7. License/user limit:
   - Check if Jira has reached user limit
   - Verify license allows additional users
   - Contact Jira admin if license upgrade needed

8. Check project visibility:
   - Verify user has access to specific projects
   - Check project permissions and roles
   - Verify user is not restricted by IP address filters
